General.Name: UPA Corporation Bhd
General.Description: UPA Corporation Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells paper-based and plastic products in Malaysia. The company operates through four segments: Manufacturing of Paper Based Products; Manufacturing of Plastic Products; Machine Trading; and Healthcare. It offers paper-based products, including notebooks, diaries, calendars, and stationeries, as well as bonded leather, PVC, and PU products for covers. The company also manufactures plastic products, such as rigid PVC, APET, PETG, and GAG sheets, as well as PVC and PETG shrinkable label films. In addition, it is involved in selling of new and refurbished printing machines, as well as provision of after-sales services. Additionally, it manufactures and markets healthcare products, such as face masks and non-woven melt blown fabric. UPA Corporation Berhad was founded in 1975 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. UPA Corporation Berhad is a subsidiary of UPA Holdings Sdn. Bhd.
